description:
This piece is a window into my studio, a place of exploration with material and process, an abstract composition made up of flowing handstyle gestures. The gestures are filtered and altered through a digital lens, situated in a 3D modelled recreation of the studio space, and accompanied by a soundscape generated using sounds recorded in the studio. 
I want to invite collaboration, exploration and experimentation with this work and the larger project it is a part of. 

See more about the project at asuscreatorxchange.com.au 

12 seconds looping video 
1920x1920 pixels 
Sounds by Mat Morison
